doc.title: Yolcu
doc.plot: Gul's wealthy father wants her to get married to a rich man, yet Gul is in love with their driver Turgut. They get married and have a daughter named Aysel. Turgut witnesses a robbery and reports it to the police taken place at Melahat's house, who is running a brothel. Melahat takes revenge from Turgut together with her friend Resat, they make a plot so that Gul becomes a brothel woman. Thus, Turgut expels Gul and Aysel from home, so does her father. Gul becomes a famous singer, Aysel wants to marry Yilmaz the attorney. As Melahat tells Turgut everything, Turgut is looking for his wife and daughter. Gul's boss tells her someone is after her, Aysel wants money from the boss to buy her sick mother medication, Resat is there and molests her, just then Gul comes in and kills Resat. Gul confesses everything at the trial and is released. Yilmaz and Aysel marry, while Gul and Turgut start a happy new life.
